𓅭 GEN/SIS : Gyn/sen 𓅬

The Genesis of the Egyptian (and PIE) family is deeply rooted in a bird cult:

𓅐 Mother 𓅓=M 𓅱=U 𓏏=T' 𓅐
𓅭𓇳 Son 𓅬 sin @ Persian haṁsáḥ "goose" ⇔ sA
𓅭𓏏 daughter (Duck+ta) Persian ordak = "duck" q.e.d.
𓄿 Aar(n) Air, a writing for Sky Father 𓊪𓏏𓎛𓀭 𓄿 Häher Herr Er
𓅮 Photer 𓊪 𓅮 𓄿 𓅱 𓏏 𓏗 𓀭 𓏥 'primeval God'
𓅬 Cyneth 𓌢𓈖𓏏𓁐 vs CoNaith 𓄟𓄠𓋤 Kinders kin 𓎂⋍𓊃⋍𓎃⋍𓋩⋍𓋹 synkh
𓅬 Cwyneth 𓌢𓈖𓏏𓁐 Twin ⇔ Cwyn Queen Swan 𓅬 vs 𓃟
𓋴𓅁 Head of family Shaman? Gamos Gon?
Gentei χήν γynhth 𓋴𓅱𓎛𓏏𓆇

There is no reason to doubt Herodots assessment that oracle-dom and augurs originally came from Egypt.

𓉔𓈖𓏌𓏲𓀀𓁐𓏥 Honuren: Family Co+naith 𓄟𓄠𓋤 conexos Kinnern kin kam,ham⋍𓊃⋍syn,zyn

The speculative extension of the system needs further investigation:
𓅓 *Oma? 𓅯Opa?
𓅓 *Bruta Britta Maris Baratheon Bharat birth 𓅭pata?
Genesis 𓊃𓈙𓏮𓅹 zhnízdo=nest 𓆂 gynishdu kin + kinners𓅸 (children)

G38 𓅬 goosen Gänsen gEnten ganter goo.ßen 𓅬 𐦖 letter 'KA'
G38 𓅬 𓋴𓏠𓈖𓅭 gamen gämsen Gänsen 𓅬 ⋍ 𓅭 gEnthen++ Ganter
G39 𓅭 ⋍gamnsen=sen=son=gonthe𓅬,genten𓅭,jeun,Jun[g],gynsen
G39 𓅭𓏏 duck : daughter dough 𓏏 talk 𐎯𐎧𐎬𐎠 Duxtar@Persian

𓅬 Gomns gones cynith cygnos swan zwin twin 𓌢
𓌢𓏏 coult be cynith 𓅬⋍cysther sister
𓌢 𓈖 𓏏 𓁐 𓅭𓏏 sister x̌aŋta ⇔ x̌aŋhar

𓅭𓇳 Sandra 𓇳
𓅬 sin χήν swan κύκν 𓅱 κύβω dumme Gans

𓎛𓅭𓏏 'Hathor'? Dochter? Druit?

𓅓𓊃𓅭 M.SS.Sen messent: present ⇔ message

𓅓𓊃𓅭 παρουσίαζαν [parousíazan] present

𓊃 𓂋 𓅱 𓅾 goose Ɣru grau

𓅾 𓏤 fear : das Grausen sen ⇔ 𓅭𓅬! (false plural ok)

𓅾 goose-fur = (G)äŋten-fear 𓅬 (Angst⇔ancious)

𓈙 SHN 𓅸𓅭 nestor = island gynos gnost
